name: Magic Is Hard
description:
Created by Matthew Jung

Play as an Barbarian with a magic cannon, although you're not entirely sure how to use it. After all,  there wasn't a manual when you found it in a dungeon. Now, the guardian demons protecting the cannon have been summoned, and you must defeat them all. Experiment and build different spells to see what works (and what doesn't).

Combine different spell groups, and release the spell to create a variety of effects. Progressing through each level will increase the length of the spell you can create, unlocking more spells for you to discover, starting from a spell length of 3. 

Controls: 

  • Move: Left Click
  • Spell Parts:
    • Group 1: W, A, S, D
    • Group 2: 3, 4, 5, E, R, T
    • Group 3: F, G, X, C, V
    • Group 4: Caps, Shift, Z, Ctrl, Alt
    • Group 5: `, 1, 2, 3, Tab, Q
  • Release spell: Spacebar
  • Pause:  Esc

Current Spells (If you don't want to experiment):

  • Small AOE: 111
  • Ranged Scatter Shot: 3333
  • Self-Destruct: 4343
  • Small Heal: 54515 
  • Creating a spell that doesn't exist will still have some effect, but will also hurt you.
